title: Schema that defines the configuration file for OEB_level2_data_migration

authURI.title: OpenID Connect auth URI
authURI.description: OpenID Connect authorization URI to the token endpoint

clientId.title: OpenID Connect client id
clientId.description: The client id registered at OpenID Connect server

user.title: Username
user.description: User to be used to request an OpenID access token

pass.title: Password
pass.description: password to be used to request an OpenID access token

storageServer.title: Storage server configuration options
storageServer.description: Perdurable storage server (B2SHARE, Zenodo) configuration options

type.title: Type of storage server
type.description: Type of storage server ('b2share' right now)

community.title: Community id
community.description: In the case of B2SHARE, the community id (its UUID) where the dataset bundle will be hosted

token.title: The submission token needed to obtain the authorization
token.description: The submission token needed to obtain the authorization

endpoint.title: Storage endpoint
endpoint.description: Storage endpoint used to submit the assessment dataset to a perdurable storage which is able to provide a persistent id (e.g. a DOI)

graphqlURI.title: GraphQL query endpoint
graphqlURI.description: GraphQL query endpoint used to query and fetch the different datasets and events

accessURI.title: OpenEBench access endpoint
accessURI.description: This endpoint is used to query existing identifiers, needed for validations

submissionURI.title: OpenEBench submission endpoint
submissionURI.description: This endpoint is used to stage-in the datasets and events
